SELECT a.DIST_MONTH AS distMonth, a.LGCS_CODE AS lgcsCode, a.SUPP_CODE AS suppCode, a.PD_CODE as pdCode, SUM(p.NEW_PLAN_NUM) - SUM(a.NEW_ACTUAL_NUM) AS unStockNum FROM ds_pd_virtual_stock_actual a INNER JOIN ds_pd_virtual_stock_plan p ON a.DIST_MONTH=p.DIST_MONTH AND a.LGCS_CODE = p.LGCS_CODE AND a.SUPP_CODE = p.SUPP_CODE AND a.PD_CODE=p.PD_CODE
GROUP BY a.DIST_MONTH,a.LGCS_CODE,a.SUPP_CODE,p.PD_CODE ORDER BY a.DIST_MONTH,a.LGCS_CODE,a.SUPP_CODE,p.PD_CODE ASC
